page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: The farms we have visited in the area are{arable, dairy or mixed. The sizes of the farms ranged from 10 to 260 hectares. All of the farmers owned their land except Mr. Sharp who farms{Oak Farm.}His farm is owned by Lincoln City Council. {Oak, Monson, Lincoln Road,}and{Fen {Farms}are all mixed, which means that they have a dairy herd as well as growing crops. All of the farmers used machines to milk the cows and the tanker came every day to collect it. {Decoy}and{Waterloo}are arable farms which means that they grow crops. All of the farms grew{wheat, barley, {potatoes and grass}to make silage which is used to feed animals in winter. Farms with no animals sold the silage.
